main event: A civilian observed a circular object in the sky, which rose to 25,000 feet, remained stationary, then descended and disappeared over a period of 4-5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being about the size of a baseball and white to yellow in color,The observation was made visually from the ground,The object followed a course from Northwest to Southeast,The sighting occurred on March 15, 1967,The conclusion of the report suggests the object was probably a hot air balloon.
witness description: Civilian observer, no additional identifying information provided.
